name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications, primarily in the healthcare and financial sectors. Expert in **Java**, **J2EE**, **Spring Boot**, and **Hibernate**, with a solid understanding of **REST** and **SOAP** services. Proficient in utilizing **GitHub** for version control and **Maven** for project management, ensuring streamlined CI/CD processes through tools like **Jenkins**. 
Skilled in designing and implementing **RDBMS** solutions, with hands-on experience in **MySQL**, **Oracle**, **SQL Server**, and **PostgreSQL**. Adept at leveraging modern frameworks including **Vue.js** for frontend development, ensuring robust user experiences.
Additionally, I bring expertise in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. Strong commitment to compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Well-versed in MLOps practices, enhancing the capabilities of AI/ML platforms with a focus on predictive analytics and real-time processing.
